class.description_1: Explore the world of numbers, equations, and mathematical concepts.
class.description_2: Discover the wonders of the natural world through scientific exploration.
class.description_3: Uncover the events and stories that shaped our past and influence our present.
class.description_4: Dive into the world of books, poems, and literary masterpieces.
class.description_5: Express yourself through the creation of visual and performing arts.
class.description_6: Explore the world of music through singing, playing instruments, and listening.

banner.title: Welcome To Education
banner.description: Education Classroom helps educators create engaging learning experiences they can personalize, manage, and measure. Part of Education Workspace for Education, it empowers educators to enhance their impact and prepare students for the future.

section_content_1.title: 150M people worldwide use Education Classroom
section_content_1.description: Education Classroom is designed with feedback from the educational community, influencing the development of new features that let educators focus on teaching and students focus on learning.

section_content_2.title: Enrich and personalize learning
section_content_2.description: Drive student agency with tools that meet students where they are â€“ and build skills for their future.

feature_1.title: Help students develop literacy skills
feature_1.description: Use Read Along, a fun, speech-based tool, to help students independently build their reading skills, while giving educators insight into their progress.

feature_2.title: Reinforce concepts with self-paced learning
feature_2.description: Assign interactive questions for YouTube videos, giving students real-time feedback as they move through a lesson, while viewing insights into their performance.

feature_3.title: Power student potential
feature_3.description: Create interactive assignments, even from existing PDFs, that provide real-time feedback and individual guidance with prompts and hints with the help of AI.

section_content_3.title: Amplify instruction with tools that simplify everyday tasks
section_content_3.description: Boost instructional time with tools purpose-built for teaching, productivity, and collaboration

feature_1.title: Inform instruction with data-driven insights
feature_1.description: Classroom analytics provide educators with insights and visibility into how students turn in, perform on, and engage with assignments, so educators can make informed decisions about the best way to provide support.

feature_2.title: Streamline lesson planning
feature_2.description: Create a link to your class, then share it with peers in your organization, so they can easily preview, select, and import high-quality classwork into their classes.

feature_3.title: Support originality with plagiarism detection
feature_3.description: Help students integrate citations and avoid unintentional plagiarism with unlimited originality reports and a school-owned repository of past work.

section_content_4.title: Operate with solutions designed to gain visibility, insights, and control
section_content_4.description: Create learning environments that are easier to manage and support educators and students with connected, safer tools.

feature_1.title: Make data-driven decisions
feature_1.description: Gain visibility into everything from class performance to individual student assignment completion with Classroom analytics (coming soon)

feature_2.title: Distribute high-quality class templates to educators
feature_2.description: Easily share high-quality class templates so educators in your organization can preview and import classwork into their own classes.

feature_3.title: Virtually visit classes to support teachers and students
feature_3.description: Designated education leaders and staff can temporarily access classes to support educators, manage substitute teachers, see information for guardian conversations, and more.
